title: Design and Analysis of Collaborative Self-Regulated Learning in Science Classrooms

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Science pedagogy course for pre-service elementary teachers including simulation activities modeled on real classrooms

learning_goals: Learners observe and document social shared regulation strategies in collaborative learning groups at least three times, producing written reports.
Learners establish and execute individual and group learning plans based on a self-regulated learning framework.
Learners analyze their motivational/emotional regulation status using smartphone-based tools and propose improvement strategies.
Learners revise scientific inquiry project deliverables at least once based on peer feedback and finalize presentation materials.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
